Alternatively, if you're in the mood for something more low-key and character-driven, "Louie" might be up your alley! This quirky drama follows Louie Evans, a mysterious tricycle rider who becomes an unlikely hero to those around him. With its offbeat humor and heartwarming story, "Louie" is a hidden gem that's sure to capture your attention.
